BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Application no. 20095326 SCK, a proposed site for 680 seat primary school known as  P.S. 331 K,  to be located at 7002-40 Fourth Ave., 364-86 Ovington Ave. (Block 5891, Lot 48 p/o), Council District No. 43, Borough of Brooklyn. This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant Section 1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law.
